title: COXSBAY
description: Cox's Bazar is a city and fishing port known for its long sandy beach and tourism attractions.

title: SRIMONGOL
description: Srimongol is the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh' with lush tea gardens and a charming atmosphere.

title: SUNDARBAN
description: Sundarbans is the world's largest mangrove forest, home to diverse flora and fauna.

title: RATARGUL
description: Ratargul Swamp Forest is a freshwater swamp known for its scenic beauty and biodiversity.

title: SAJEK
description: Sajek Valley offers breathtaking views with its serene landscapes and picturesque surroundings.

title: LALBAGH
description: Lalbagh Fort is a historic palace and fortress, a major landmark in the heart of Dhaka.

title: KUAKATA
description: Kuakata is a panoramic sea beach known for its natural beauty and stunning sunset views.

title: JAFLONG
description: Jaflong is a popular tourist spot with tea gardens, hills, and the scenic Dawki River.

title: AHSAN
description: Ahsan Manzil is a historical palace, a symbol of architectural beauty in Dhaka.

title: LAWACHARA
description: Lawachara National Park is a biodiversity hotspot and wildlife sanctuary in Srimongol.
